attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Prime Minister (Mr Brown),

I use petition because the email of Number 10 is under maintenance at this time.

Hope I can be appointed for House of Lords as referred by former Prime Minister Mr T Blair.

Best wishes!
God bless British Empire!

Pok Lai Stephen LI
Father
Candidate for House of Lords
Applying for Nobel Peace Prize

rejection.details:
You can write to the PM at the following address:

10 Downing Street,
London,
SW1A 2AA
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
